page.title: 17Block D8_D10
page.content: {Block D8} This area is comprised of a number of small farms.The land is rough pasture_ land.Traversed by the railway and by the B4317,the area is dotted with old mine shafts,many of which were re_worked by open-cast mining methods in the 1960's and 1970's. {Block D9} An area of small farms.The land is of poor quality,much of it wooded.It is traversed by a narrow parish road.Most of the area lies outside the parish boundary. {Block D10} Most of this area is taken up by the old Pentremawr Colliery and its railway sidings."Company" housing is found in close proximity to the now closed colliery.Railway Terrace and Capel Ifan Terrace were built by the owners of the colliery.All the houses>
